original_title: Risen: The Story of Chron "Hell Razah" Smith
overview: Discovered by Wu-Tang Clan's RZA, Hell Razah had a promising career and gold records before he was tragically struck down with a brain aneurysm. Risen traces his journey to recovery - both spiritually and physically - back to the mic.
tagline: His records went gold then tragedy struck now heâ€™s fighting his way back to the mic.
title: Risen: The Story of Chron "Hell Razah" Smith
